creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: over-the-head garment, folded at shoulders; rectangular fabric with rectangle neck hole in center; grey and black striped fabric; stripes horizontal across shoulder and upper body area, vertical on lower body and lower parts of sleeves; design formed by white fabric with cutouts sewn onto visible side of garment; vertical stripes of triangles pointing sideways on lower front and back; large concentric circles filled with bands of diamonds and diamond-checkerboard pattern in center; rectangular diamond-checker pattern with stripes on either side running along top fold on one side
title: Agbada
